code: @Test public void testWireTapLog() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }
public void configure() {     Endpoint tap = endpoint("log:com.foo.MyApp?level=WARN").     from("direct:start").wireTap(tap).to("mock:result"). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             Endpoint tap = endpoint("log:com.foo.MyApp?level=WARN").             from("direct:start").wireTap(tap).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
